程序包 frame

类 MainFrame

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
java.awt.Window
java.awt.Frame
javax.swing.JFrame
frame.MainFrame
所有已实现的接口:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class MainFrame
extends javax.swing.JFrame
main frame that holds panels for different pages only one panel is loaded at a time a panel must be unloaded before loading another one
版本:
2.0 Add Satisflight logo., 1.4 appearance improvement, 1.3 main frame with enhanced functions and refined coding style, 1.2 main frame with restored ui design and controlling methods, 1.1 main frame with icon added and db_reader embedded, 1.0 initial version main frame
作者:
zaitian, wcy, Zhang Zeyu
另请参阅:

    deciding whether bars are displayed

  • 构造器详细资料

    • MainFrame

      public MainFrame()
      Main frame with panels initialized.

  • 方法详细资料

    • loadPanel

      public void loadPanel​(javax.swing.JPanel panel)
      loading a panel into the center panel of main frame note that it will take up almost whole frame
      参数:
      panel - the panel to be loaded

    • getLoadedPanel

      public java.awt.Component getLoadedPanel()
      access the panel loaded in the center panel
      返回:
      the panel loaded in the center panel, if exists

    • unloadPanel

      public void unloadPanel​(java.awt.Component panel)
      unload a panel from the center panel nothing is done if no panel exists
      参数:
      panel - the panel to be unloaded

    • displayComponents

      public void displayComponents​(java.lang.Boolean welcome, java.lang.Boolean exit, java.lang.Boolean back)
      deciding whether components are displayed
      参数:
      welcome - welcome text
      exit - exit button
      back - back button

    • hideBars

      public void hideBars​(java.lang.Boolean flag)
      deciding whether bars are displayed
      参数:
      flag - top and bottom bars

    • setWelcomeText

      public void setWelcomeText()
      set welcome text with passenger's name when available

    • resetWelcomeText

      public void resetWelcomeText()
      reset welcome text to default when passenger's name is not available
